title: NFL ATL: Divisional Round Weekend preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Divisional Round Weekend preview
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling and Gregg Rosenthal -- preview Divisional Round Weekend.  Which teams will get one step closer toward Super Bowl XLVIII?  Listen in, join the conversation on Twitter using @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL and vote for the heroes in this year's Stitcher Awards at http://stitcher.promotw.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
